targets.expr: max((kube_node_status_condition{node=~"$node", condition=~"ClusterMgmt.*|ClusterDeploy.*|Csadm.*", condition!~".*NodeNIC.*", condition!~".*NodeSwitchPortError", status="true"} > 0) or on (node) kube_node_spec_taint{job="kube-state-metrics",key="node.kubernetes.io/unreachable",effect="NoSchedule", node=~"$node"} == 1)

((kube_node_status_condition{node="$node", condition!~"Ready|ClusterMgmt.*|Csadm.*", status="true"} > 0) >=bool 0) or on (node) 
(kube_node_spec_taint{node="$node", job="kube-state-metrics",key="node.kubernetes.io/unreachable",effect="NoSchedule"} == 1)
or on (node) (kube_node_spec_taint{node="$node", job="kube-state-metrics",key="node.kubernetes.io/unreachable",effect="NoSchedule"} == 1)

panels.description:
Error if the node has been marked as down by an administrator or by other fault detection.
Check the csadm tool for a description of the issue.
panels.title: csadm Status

panels.description: "Data does not have a time field" indicates no kubernetes problems
panels.title: Kube Health

panels.description: Interfaces that are down, flapping, or aren't responding to pings (from CPingmesh).

targets.expr:
min by (host, nic) (increase(pingmesh_server_pings_total{host=~"$node"}[5m]) == 0)
unless on (host, nic)
(pingmesh_server_healthy < 1)

panels.title: Network Health
Fan and Thermal sensor status (may not be available on all nodes)

panels.description: Fan speeds in the range 0-100 are probably a percentage of max speed, while higher values are RPMs
panels.title: Fan Speeds

targets.expr: (node_hwmon_sensor_label{label="Tdie", instance="$internal_ip:9100"} or node_hwmon_sensor_label{label=~"Tccd.*", instance="$internal_ip:9100"} or node_hwmon_sensor_label{label=~"Package id.*", instance="$internal_ip:9100"}) * on (instance, chip, sensor) group_right (label) node_hwmon_temp_celsius{instance="$internal_ip:9100"}

panels.description: Fan speeds below the critical threshold. Speeds in the range 0-100 are probably a percentage of max speed, while higher values are RPMs

targets.expr: (max_over_time(node_thermals_fan{node="$node"} [$__rate_interval]) < ignoring (type) node_thermals_fan_thresh{node="$node", type="error"}) * on (index, node) group_left (thresh) count_values without() ("thresh", node_thermals_fan_thresh{type="error", node="$node"})

panels.title: Critical Fan Speeds

panels.description: Temperature sensors that exceed the critical threshold.

targets.expr: (max_over_time(node_thermals_thermometer{node="$node"} [$__rate_interval]) > ignoring (type) node_thermals_thermometer_thresh{node="$node", type="error"}) * on (index, node) group_left (thresh) count_values without() ("thresh", node_thermals_thermometer_thresh{type="error", node="$node"})

panels.title: Critical Temperature Sensors
CPU core frequency as % of max
Average CPU frequency as % of max
